title: Comprehensive Testing Implementation Summary
details: Comprehensive unit testing strategy implementation complete through Phase 2 (partial). Implemented 32 new tests across BroadcastManager (13 tests) and SyncCoordinator (19 tests). All 1846 tests passing. Used Context7 MCP for WebExtensions API validation, Perplexity MCP for testing pattern research, Agentic-Tools MCP for memory storage. Infrastructure complete: cross-tab simulator, test utilities, test fixtures. Documented in docs/implementation-summaries/. Remaining: VisibilityHandler, UpdateHandler, StateManager, PanelManager, Integration scenarios. API alignment critical for remaining tests - handlers use specific constructor patterns and property names.
